title: 5BX plan for physical fitness. Chart 1-5
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Walford Hewitson and Bill Rice
brief_description: The Royal Canadian Air Force show the five basic exercises that keep their airmen trim, lively and alert. These are the same exercises as those presented in the R.C.A.F. booklet of the same title. Produced for The Royal Canadian Air Force.
